document.full_text: u-prince  - haiti's former dictator jean-claude "baby doc" duvalier, who faces charges of corruption and rights abuses after returning from exile in january, is being treated in a hospital after falling ill, aides said thursday.
document.title: duvalier taken to haiti hospital after falling ill
lines_and_colors: u-prince  - haiti's former dictator jean-claude "baby doc" duvalier, who faces charges of corruption and rights abuses after returning from exile in january, is being treated in a hospital after falling ill, aides said thursday.
